'''''Yank E. Suck's''''' (formerly '''Yank E. Suck's Pizza Time Theatre''' and '''Yank E. Suck's Pizza''') is a chain of [[Family Entertainment Center|family entertainment center]]s. Chuck E. Cheese's is the main brand of CEC Entertainment, Inc., ({{nyse|CEC}}) with its headquarters in [[Irving, Texas|Irving]], Texas.<ref name="investor"/>
+
'''''Chuck E. Cheese's''''' (formerly '''Chuck E. Cheese's Pizza Time Theatre''' and '''Chuck E. Cheese's Pizza''') is a chain of [[Family Entertainment Center|family entertainment center]]s. Chuck E. Cheese's is the main brand of CEC Entertainment, Inc., ({{nyse|CEC}}) with its headquarters in [[Irving, Texas|Irving]], Texas.<ref name="investor"/>
The concept is a sit-down [[pizza]] restaurant, complemented by [[arcade game]]s, [[amusement ride]]s, an [[audio-Animatronics|animatronic]] show, and other diversions, such as climbing equipment, tubes, and slides â all mainly directed at younger children.<ref name="fsm"/> The brand is represented by Chuck E. Cheese, an [[anthropomorphism|anthropomorphic]] [[mouse]].<ref name="fsm"/><ref>{{cite web|title=Entertainment|url=http://www.chuckecheese.com/the-experience/entertainment.php|work=Chuck E. Cheese's Official Site|publisher=CEC Entertainment, Inc|format=PHP|accessdate=2009-05-12}}</ref>
The concept is a sit-down [[pizza]] restaurant, complemented by [[arcade game]]s, [[amusement ride]]s, an [[audio-Animatronics|animatronic]] show, and other diversions, such as climbing equipment, tubes, and slides â all mainly directed at younger children.<ref name="fsm"/> The brand is represented by Chuck E. Cheese, an [[anthropomorphism|anthropomorphic]] [[mouse]].<ref name="fsm"/><ref>{{cite web|title=Entertainment|url=http://www.chuckecheese.com/the-experience/entertainment.php|work=Chuck E. Cheese's Official Site|publisher=CEC Entertainment, Inc|format=PHP|accessdate=2009-05-12}}</ref>
